alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:24PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Idaho and western Clearwater Counties through 530 PM PDT... At 422 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Weippe, or 13 miles east of Orofino, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pierce, Weippe, Headquarters, Cardiff, Jaype and Woodland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Orofino, Grangeville Region
